Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exemption from taxation for alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exemption from taxation for alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the waiver of certain permit and inspection fees for work related to plumbing and electrical systems in buildings damaged by the severe storm that occurred on October 29 and 30, 2012, commonly referred to as "Hurricane Sandy."
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Extending the waiver of certain permit and inspection fees for work related to plumbing and electrical systems in buildings damaged by “Hurricane Sandy.”

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exemption from taxation for alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exemption from taxation for alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the waiver of certain permit and inspection fees for work related to plumbing and electrical systems in buildings damaged by the severe storm that occurred on October 29 and 30, 2012, commonly referred to as "Hurricane Sandy."
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Extending the waiver of certain permit and inspection fees for work related to plumbing and electrical systems in buildings damaged by “Hurricane Sandy.”
